title: Easter egg nests
ingredients: ['Nests', '250g butter, softened', '100g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs, separated', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '275g plain flour', '175g pecans or walnuts, finely chopped', 'Decoration', '1 bar plain chocolate (or white chocolate)', '1 large bag candy covered mini chocolate eggs']
